import React from 'react'; import './Header.css'; import logo from '../img/image1.svg'; import basket from '../img/Vector.svg' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; import { useSelector } from 'react-redux'; import { animateScroll as scroll } from "react-scroll"; export default function Header() { const cart = useSelector(store => store.basket.basket) return (
Catalog

{cart.reduce((sum, value ) => sum + value.count, 0)}
) }
